message: What's the latest and greatest approach to building Facebook apps in Ruby/Rails? A lot of the stuff that comes up on Google seems outdated.

Current best approach I've seen is Devise and/or Omniauth for authentication, fb_graph is a decent wrapper for graph API calls, supplement with the FBJS/FQL APIs when needed. Yeah, it's kind of a mess.
koala (https://github.com/arsduo/koala) is a nice library to work with Facebook, too. We've been using it for WikiSigns (https://github.com/huerlisi/wikisigns) to update the stream.
koala and Devise play well together.
